overview:
Easy Agency is a project-based Marketing and Advertising agency. They offer a streamlined approach to building brands, driving sales and growing market share.

Their team has helped make many Fortune 500 brands better. Whether it is Packaged Goods, Entertainment, Telecom, Technology, Pharmaceutical, Financial Services, Food, Wine & Spirits or Retail, rest assured that they speak your language.

Client experience includes: Procter & Gamble, Cadbury Adams, Verizon, DIRECTV, Century21, Kraft, Diageo, Citibank, Greyhound, Johnson & Johnson, Etc.

Their revamped Marketing, Advertising & Publicity service model is sans pushy sales pitches or creative egos. Working with them is as EASY as it should be.

They are a full-service communications agency offering Consumer Research, Communications Planning, Creative Development, Publicity, Reputation Management and all things Digital.

They’re a scalable, one-stop resource that can help you develop your in-house Marketing and Advertising capabilities. All projects are led by an experienced senior manager and are supported by dedicated specialists from all advertising and marketing disciplines.

SERVICES:

  • Marketing/Advertising: Strategy & Execution
  • Creative: Concepting, Design & Production
  • Media: Online/Offline, Traditional, Digital & Social Media
  • Digital: Strategy, Design and Production
  • Branded Entertainment Content Development: Film, Television, Viral, Etc.
  • Celebrity Publicity, Media and Fan Management
  • Multicultural Strategy and Execution: Hispanic Marketing
